entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Compiler should not report Warning RZ2012 when using Blazor bind syntax #76356

Closed

  • Refactor -> Extract Method ignores namespace aliases #70024
    Backlog
  • Test Plan for Overload Resolution Priority #74131
    .NET 9
  • Symbol.ToDisplayString(SymbolDisplayFormat.FullyQualifiedFormat) does not escape everything it should #74117
    17.13
  • Potential missed case with `CS1918` #76278
  • Then using extract method it does not respect the selection #72561
    18.0
  • VS 2017 RC - refactor doesnt respect editorconfig settings #32427
    Backlog
  • Fix all of inline temporary with multiple #region directives duplicates a directive #62805
    Backlog
  • 'Inline variable declaration' spacing incorrect with csharp_space_around_declaration_statements=ignore #35993
    Backlog
  • Cache vs-mef composition to improve startup perf #68568
    Backlog
  • Interceptors suppress analyzer warnings when location is the entire `InvocationExpressionSyntax`, but not when location is `InvocationExpressionSyntax.Expression` #76266
  • [nuget add using] would be nice to provide add ref fixer on unresolved using statement #8788
    Backlog
  • Questions about XML Documentation #72528
  • Compilation error involving dynamic parameter not being detected #76322
  • IDE0052 Reported for Ref Field Assignment #71847
    17.13
  • Extract Method changes 'using var' semantic to 'out parameter' semantic #39329
    Backlog
  • Extract Method should understand `using` declarations #35646
    Backlog
  • Extract Method Selection expansion doesn't work if selection starts in an if conditional #18656
    Backlog
  • IDE0032 code fixer misses method arguments and produces invalid C# code (CS0103) #76349
    18.0
  • IDE0017 does not preserve indentation #46665
    Backlog
  • Convert to 'switch' statement changes behaviour #71295
    18.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Do not check overridden required members during in-type member enforcement #76363
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • WIP: Reduce allocations from doing repeated adds into an ImmutableDictionary in SolutionCompilationState.ComputeFrozenSnapshot #76361
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Update 'add parameter' to assign to field/property when adding a parameter to a primary constructor. #76360
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • [WIP] Change PR Val builds to be test signed #76358
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Razor synchronize loader #76357
    untriaged
  • Fix TFM inconsistency in BuildHost #76354
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Initialize fields when possible when adding parameters to constructors. #76352
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • feat(lsp): add --pipe parameter #76351
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Implement editorconfig serializer for naming style preferences #76350
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Do not bail generating base type initializer in the presence of use site warnings #76347
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Do not add imports automatically in extract method #76362
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Share more code between "Generate Constructor", "Add Parameter" and "Initialize Member from Parameter" #76359
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Cache the MEF composition in the Roslyn LSP. #76276
    Area-IDE, LSP, VSCode, Next
  • Update the Copilot powered Inline Rename UX #76001
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Support adding package and reference assemblies from an import #76337
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Disable signing validation for the PR Val pipeline. #76353
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Remove unnecessary parentheses from spread elements #76348
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Add tests showing issues no longer repro #76346
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Do not pull out 'using local decl' variables unnecessarily in extract method. #76343
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Allow extract method even when tokens aren't perfectly selected by the user. #76345
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Fix issue with remove unused members and ref-fields #76336
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Indent expressions when converting to object initializer #76334
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Fix broken 'convert if to switch' case with recursive analysis #76317
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next

Updated

  • Warn for redundant pattern in `not ... or <redundant>` pattern #75581
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Handle other initializer kinds in ref safety analysis #76339
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Ref Fields
  • Threading fixes #76230
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove scope variance exceptions #76296
    Area-Compilers
  • Check ref safety of arg mixing in collection initializers #76237
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Ref Fields, 17.13
  • Prefer ReadOnlySpan over Span as better conversion target #76300
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Avoid reusing temps whose refs might be captured #76009
    Area-Compilers
  • Consider RefSafetyRules with UnscopedRef #75930
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Handle deconstruct pattern in ref safety analysis #75511
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add spec for the data section string literals feature flag #76139
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Feature - String Literals in Data Section as UTF8
  • Allow user to control if they want generated-doc results to appear in navigate to. #74765
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Dictionary expressions: initial binding and lowering support #76257
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, Feature - Dictionary Expressions
